clinical_study.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study Comparing VI-0521 With Placebo in Obese Adolescents

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to describe the pharmacokinetic profiles of VI-0521 in obese adolescents.

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent clearance (CL/F) of phentermine and topiramate
Apparent volume of distribution (Vc/F) of phentermine and topiramate
Area under the curve (AUC) of phentermine and topiramate
Maximum concentration (Cmax) of phentermine and topiramate

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in absolute value of glycemic parameters (fasting glucose, insulin, HOMA-IR)
secondary_outcome.description: OGTT of fasting and 2-hr glucose and insulin

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent change in lipid parameters (triglyceride & HDL)
Change in visual analog scale (VAS) hunger scores
Change in visual analog scale (VAS) satiety scores

intervention.description: phentermine 7.5 mg and topiramate 46 mg, po once daily
phentermine 15 mg and topiramate 92 mg, po once daily
